original_text: When two men fight together, perhaps one of them may hit a pregnant woman. As a result of the fight, she may give birth to her child before the right time. If the man has not hurt the woman very much, he must pay money to her husband. He must pay the amount of money that the husband demands. A judge must agree that the money for his punishment is fair.
korean_text: 사람이 서로 싸우다가 임신한 여인을 쳐서 낙태하게 하였으나 다른 해가 없으면 그 남편의 청구대로 반드시 벌금을 내되 재판장의 판결을 따라 낼 것이니라

sentences.original_text: perhaps one of them may hit a pregnant woman
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 그들 중 한 사람이 임산부를 칠 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: As a result of the fight
she may give birth to her child before the right time
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 제때 전에 아기를 낳을 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: If the man has not hurt the woman very much
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 남자가 여자를 심하게 다치게 하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: he must pay money to her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀의 남편에게 돈을 지불해야 한다

sentences.original_text: He must pay the amount of money that the husband demands
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남편이 요구하는 돈의 금액을 지불해야 한다

sentences.original_text: A judge must agree that the money for his punishment is fair
sentences.korean_translation: 판사는 그의 벌에 대한 돈이 공정하다고 동의해야 한다
